summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division's invitation to victims of Jeffrey Epstein for briefings in Miramar, Florida, and New York City. An attorney RSVPs for a confidential client to attend the Florida briefing, emphasizing the need to protect the client's identity.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI briefings; the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to attend the meetings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miramar
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office in Miramar, Florida.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized confidential briefings for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
An attorney confirmed a client's attendance at the Miramar briefing while requesting confidentiality as the client's name had never been publicly released.
The briefings required detailed security information for attendees, including Social Security Numbers, indicating a high level of federal security protocol.
